body: The amount of stupidity on the comments here is mind boggling. Firstly, the author drew a school boy who gets turned into a girl for the first time where he doesn't have any interactions with any real girl prior to him becoming a girl. So his knowledges of a girl are with his immatured understanding of girls. Thus when he said girls can't cum on their own are the character's immaturity and not the author's immaturity. So I wondered who are the immatured ones who bashes on the author.
